speaker: Young Woman
lines: You give the woman some of the food and water you have.
She thanks you for your help.
And starts to head off into the direction you pointed her in.
After a few minutes, continuing on, you notice yourself feeling drowsy and start to fall asleep.
She must have been a Hagraven, poisining your drink,
You wake up to find yourself in a cell, chained to the wall.
An ugly Hagraven is standing over you, laughing at your weakness, this time in her true form.
She says she will eat you alive, and you will be her next meal.
After she leaves, you hear a voice from a nearby cell, calling out to you.
Another prisoner is calling out to you.
He is a human, holding out a key in his hands.
'Take it, I can't reach the lock from here.' He says.

choices.text: Try to break the chains yourself
